java.lang.Object

    • orbit

      public void orbit(int r1, int g1, int b1, int r2, int g2, int b2, double percentLed)
      Orbit effect on the LED strip segment
      Parameters:
      r1 - red value of the first color
      g1 - green value of the first color
      b1 - blue value of the first color
      r2 - red value of the second color
      g2 - green value of the second color
      b2 - blue value of the second color
      percentLed - the percentage of the LED strip segment to orbit
